house_listing.house_description: Beautiful 3 br floorplan with 2 master suites, dramatic cathedral ceilings,2 car garage,private fenced backyard other comparable homes starting at 214,000. Walk to marina restuarants and beaches. Great price for great neck!!!
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s),Contemporary Style, Fenced, Garage Door Opener, Loft, OutsideSprinkler System, Walk-In Closet(s)
